text.__SUMMARY__: Candida bromeliacearum is a yeast species. Its type strain is UNESP 00-103T (=CBS 10002T =NRRL Y-27811T).
text.Further reading:
Kurtzman, Cletus; Fell, J.W.; Boekhout, Teun, eds. (2011). The Yeasts: A Taxonomic Study. 1 (5th ed.). Elsevier. ISBN 978-0-08-093127-2.
Rosa, Carlos A.; Peter, Gabor, eds. (2006). Biodiversity and Ecophysiology of Yeasts. 1. Springer. ISBN 978-3-540-30985-7.
